Hardware

Deltaweb Cluster [2018]
Digital Bauhaus Lab
Specification: 78 nodes, 1248 cores at 2.1 GHz, 10 TB RAM, 12 480 TB HDD
Webis storage server [2017]
Digital Bauhaus Lab
Specification: 1 server, 20 cores at 2.2 GHz, 0.1 TB RAM, 240 TB HDD
Gammaweb Cluster [2016]
Digital Bauhaus Lab
Specification: 3 nodes, 96 cores at 2.1 GHz, 4.5 TB RAM, 22.5 TB SSD, 24 GeForce GTX 1080
Betaweb Cluster [2015]
Digital Bauhaus Lab
Specification: 145 nodes, 1740 cores at 2.4 GHz, 27.2 TB RAM, 4060 TB HDD
Alphaweb Cluster [2009]
B11 R204
Specification: 44 nodes, 88 cores at 1 - 2 GHz, 0.4 TB RAM, 352 TB HDD
Webis rack servers [2009]
B11 RK15
Specification: 7 servers, up to 12 cores at 2.4 GHz, 128 GB RAM, 21.6 TB HDD
